heading: Tonight
text: Chance of isolated rain showers north of Route 4, turning over to snow in the Green Mountains. Chance of valley fog. Lows in the low 30s, a few 20s in the cold spots in the northeast, increasing to the mid 30s in the Champlain Valley. Light and variable wind.

heading: Sunday
text: Mostly cloudy with periods of sunshine. Increasing chance of rain showers in the north, turning over to snow in the mountains. Highs from the mid 40s to near 50, increasing to the low to mid-50s in the southern valleys. Light northwest wind.

heading: Sunday Night
text: Increasing clearing overnight, clouds sticking around in the northeast. Chance of an isolated mountain rain or snow shower in the north. Patchy valley fog developing before dawn. Lows from the mid to upper 20s, near 30 along Lake Champlain.
